title: Textile, Late 16th - early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, wool
Technique: satin appliqué, embroidered and couched, on even sided twill
description: Section of horizontal border filled with arabesque foliage and stems enclosing urn and flowers; guard border with symmetrical stems, foliage, interlacery. Couched red and white satin outlined in heavy gold thread caught down in bunches; this also forms stems. Dark yellow-green wool ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, Late 16th - early 17th century.Medium: silk, wool
Technique: satin appliqué, embroidered and couched, on even sided twill. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1954-167-28.
